definitions.body: complain: Ps 55:18, Ps 77:4 (both ‖[[הָמָה ]]), Job 7:11 ([[בְּמַר נַפְשִׁי]]), + Ps 6:7 (rd. prob. [[אָשִׁימָה]] for [[אַשְׁחֶה]]).

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: talk (about), sing (of): abs. Ju Jdg 5:10 (ode); c. [[ב]], Ps 105:2 = 1Ch 16:9 (‖[[שִׁיר ]], [[זִמֵּר]]; so SS Gerber, but poss. =
so Dr), Ps 69:13 ([[ב]] pers. against; ‖[[נְגִינוֹת ]], of mocking words).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. sf. pers. talk (with) Pr 6:22 (del. Toy); c. [[לְ]] speak to Job 12:8 (Di ‘sprich sinnend’; Hi Bu rd. [[שֶׁרֶץ]]; Kau [[חַיַּת]] (so Bu as altern.), Bö al. sub II. [[שִׂיחַ]]).

definitions.title: Pôl‘el
definitions.body: meditate, consider: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְשׂוֹחֵחַ]] Is 53:8 (abs.); 1 S.
